mapper.insert: insert into parkinglot (name, addr, type, price, price2, time, valet, maxnum, obstacle, maxheight, maxwidth, maxweight, latitude, longitude) values(#{name}, #{addr}, #{type}, #{price}, #{price2}, now(), #{valet}, #{maxnum}, #{obstacle}, #{maxheight}, #{maxwidth}, #{maxweight}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})
mapper.update: update parkinglot set addr = #{addr}, type = #{type}, price = #{price}, price2 = #{price2}, valet = #{valet}, maxnum = #{maxnum}, obstacle = #{obstacle}, maxheight = #{maxheight}, maxwidth = #{maxwidth}, maxweight = #{maxweight}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude} where name = #{name}
